æ•ˆå†…å­˜ï¼‰ BubbleSort InsertionSort SelectionSort MergeSort 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566INF = 0xffffffffffffffdef BubbleSort(A): for i in range(len(A)-1): for j in range(len(A)-1, i, -1): if(A[j]<A[j-1]): A[j], A[j-1] = A[j-1], A[j] return Adef InsertionSort(A): for i in range(1, len(A)): current = A[i] j = i-1 while (j>=0 and A[j]>=current): A[j+1] = A[j] j -= 1 A[j+1] = current return Adef SelectionSort(A): for i in range(len(A)-1): minx = INF minPos = -1 for j in range(i, len(A)): if(A[j] < minx): minx = A[j] minPos = j A[i], A[minPos] = A[minPos], A[i] return Adef Merge(L,R): m = len(L) + len(R) #å“¨å…µï¼ L += [INF] R += [INF] S = [] i = 0 j = 0 for k in range(m): if(L[i]>R[j]): S += [R[j]] j += 1 else: S += [L[i]] i += 1 return Sdef MergeSort(A): r = len(A)-1; if (0 >= r): return A mid = (0+r)//2 L = MergeSort(A[:(mid+1)]) R = MergeSort(A[(mid+1):]) return efficient"çš„è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œä½†å¹¶ä¸æ„å‘³ç€å®ƒ"Computation efficient" æ—¢ç„¶ä¹˜æ³•å¯¹äºæˆ‘ä»¬è€Œè¨€æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»£ä»·è¾ƒå¤§çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬èƒ½ä¸èƒ½å°½é‡è€ƒè™‘å‡å°‘ä¹˜æ³•ã€‚ï¼ˆå“ªæ€•å¢å¤šåŠ å‡æ³•ï¼‰ ad+bc=(a+b)(c+d)âˆ’acâˆ’bdad+bc=(a+b)(c+d)-ac-bd ad+bc=(a+b)(c+d)âˆ’acâˆ’bd ä¼¼ä¹æœ‰ä¸€äº›ç¥å¥‡çš„äº‹æƒ…å‘ç”Ÿäº†ï¼ŒåŸæœ¬ä¸¤æ¬¡ä¹˜æ³•çš„æ“ä½œä¼¼ä¹ç°åœ¨ç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡å°±å¯ä»¥å®Œæˆäº†å‘¢ï¼ äºæ˜¯åŸæœ¬ T(n)T(n)T(n)ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯Worst Running Timeï¼Œçš„é€’æ¨å¼ä¼¼ä¹ä¹Ÿå‘ç”Ÿäº†å˜åŒ–ï¼ T(n)=3T(n/2)+O(n)T(n)=3T(n/2)+O(n) T(n)=3T(n/2)+O(n) æˆ‘ä»¬å†æ¬¡åˆ©ç”¨Master Methodï¼Œå¾—åˆ°çš„æ–°çš„ç»“æœT(n)=O(nlogâ¡23)â‰ˆO(n1.6)T(n) = O( n^{\log_2{3}} ) \approx O(n^{1.6})T(n)=O(nlog2â€‹3)â‰ˆO(n1.6) ä¼¼ä¹çš„ç¡®æ˜¯ä¸ªç•¥ä¼˜çš„ç®—æ³•å‘¢ï¼ ç„¶åæˆ‘åŠ¨æ‰‹å®ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸‹è¿™ä¸ªè¯¡å¼‚çš„ç®—æ³• 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041import numpy as npfrom multHelpers import *#makeInt(x)#getDigits(X)#def multABunch(myFn, nVals, numTrials=20#myFn - Function to be used in multiplication#nVals - List include different length for data generator#numTrials - how many times of testing for each length#x - List, Y - Intdef karatsubaMult(X, Y): x = getDigits(X) y = getDigits(Y) nx = len(x) ny = len(y) n = max(nx, ny) x = [0 for i in range(n-nx)] + x y = [0 for i in range(n-ny)] + y return karatsubaMult_Helper(x, y)def karatsubaMult_Helper(x, y): n = len(x) if (n!=1 and n%2==1): x = [0] + x y = [0] + y n = len(x) if(n==1): return x[0]*y[0] a = x[:n//2] b = x[n//2:] c = y[:n//2] d = y[n//2:] termAC = karatsubaMult_Helper(a, c) termBD = karatsubaMult_Helper(b, d) termMID = karatsubaMult(makeInt(a)+makeInt(b), makeInt(c)+makeInt(d))-termAC-termBD ret = (10**n)*termAC+(10**(n//2))*termMID+termBD #print(x, y, termAC, termBD, termMID, ret) return retif __name__=="__main__": X = 212342131398 Y = 25415243554767 print(X*Y) print(karatsubaMult(X, Y))
